title: Council Decision 2012/50/CFSP of 27 January 2012 amending Decision 2011/72/CFSP concerning restrictive measures directed against certain persons and entities in view of the situation in Tunisia
header:
31.1.2012 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 27/11
COUNCIL DECISION 2012/50/CFSP
of 27 January 2012
amending Decision 2011/72/CFSP concerning restrictive measures directed against certain persons and entities in view of the situation in Tunisia
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article 29 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) On 31 January 2011, the Council adopted Decision 2011/72/CFSP (1).
(2) On the basis of a review of Decision 2011/72/CFSP, the restrictive measures should be extended until 31 January 2013.
(3) Decision 2011/72/CFSP should be amended accordingly,
main_body:
Article 5 of Decision 2011/72/CFSP is replaced by the following:
‘Article 5
This Decision shall apply until 31 January 2013. It shall be kept under constant review. It may be renewed or amended, as appropriate, if the Council deems that its objectives have not been met.’.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 January 2012.
For the Council
The President
N. WAMMEN
(1)  OJ L 28, 2.2.2011, p. 62.
